articles.title: Patrons at hawker centres, coffee shops, food courts who don't return trays, clear tables to be warned or fined: NEA - TODAYonline
articles.description: SINGAPORE — From Sept 1, diners at hawker centres must return their dirty trays, crockery and litter on tables after a meal, and repeat offenders who do not comply may face fines of S$300 or more, the National Environment Agency (NEA) said on Friday (May 14).
